name: Spring Herb Popovers
author: Anonymous
summary: These crispy, warm popovers with fresh herbs will be a delicious addition to your next meal.
ingredients: ¼ cup LAND O LAKES® Butter with Olive Oil and Sea Salt, melted
1 ½ cups milk, at room temperature
4 each LAND O LAKES® Eggs, at room temperature, lightly beaten
1 tablespoon finely chopped fresh dill weed
¼ tablespoon LAND O LAKES® Butter with Canola Oil
directions: Brush 12 popover cups with 1 tablespoon melted butter
Combine remaining 3 tablespoons butter, flour, milk, eggs, chives, dill and salt in bowl; mix well
Pour batter into preheated popover cups, filling about half full
(Do not open oven door during baking
) Remove from oven; poke top of each popover with sharp knife to release steam
Serve warm with Butter with Canola Oil, if desired
